::Hakibuscon::

    Hakibuscon approached the Decepticon base with caution,=
 transforming to robot mode.  He activated his stealth mode, which made him=
 invisible to the defenses.  He sent a message through to all Decepticons i=
n the Dark Avian.

    "Fellow Decepticons!  Do you hear me?  It's me, Wing=
span!  I'm alive!  I've got a new body, but I'm still a Decepticon, always =
and forever!" Hakibuscon said, faking his identity.  He learned that a boun=
ty hunter should never reveal his true identity.
